name: MathType Translator Definition Language
summary: Learn about .TDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MathType uses TDL files to ensure consistency in representing mathematical expressions, regardless of the font used across different platforms and documents. Additionally, the TDL format makes it easier for users to work with various types of content in mathematical and scientific writing.

description: A TDL file contains Translator Definition Language (TDL) used by Design Science MathType, a program that helps users write complex math equations and symbols. MathType references the information in a TDL file to convert characters from specific fonts into mathematical symbols. Users can modify TDL files packaged with MathType (found in the Translators folder) or create new TDL files if translations in existing files are insufficient.
